sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

It is given that STUV is a parallelogram and W is a point on the side TU and VW when produced meets ST at point X . Then prove that
\[
	\frac{VW }{WX } = \frac{VU }{TX } 
\]
and
\[
	\frac{VX }{VW } = \frac{SX }{VU }
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Since STUV is a parallelogram, we have $SV \parallel TU $, and $VU = ST $.

Now, in triangle SXV , we have $TW \parallel SV $.
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{WX }{VW } = \frac{TX }{VU }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{WX }{VW } = \frac{TX }{VU }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{VW }{WX } = \frac{VU }{TX }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, adding 1 to both sides of the above equation, we get
\[
	\frac{VW }{WX } + 1 = \frac{VU }{TX } + 1
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{VW + WX }{WX } = \frac{VU + TX }{TX }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{VX }{WX } = \frac{ST + TX }{TX }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{VX }{WX } = \frac{SX }{TX }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now, dividing the above two results, we get
\[
	\frac{VX }{VW } = \frac{SX }{VU }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Using basic proprotionality theorem, $\frac{WX }{VW } = \frac{TX }{VU }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking reciprocal of the previous equation, we get $\Rightarrow \frac{VW }{WX } = \frac{VU }{TX }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon adding 1, we get $\frac{VW }{WX } + 1 = \frac{VU }{TX } + 1$, and further simplification, we get $\frac{VW + WX }{WX } = \frac{VU + TX }{TX}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Since, $VW + WX = VX$, $VU = ST$ and $ST + TX= SX$, we get $\frac{VX }{WX } = \frac{SX }{TX }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
